definition: of a dark somewhat brownish black, marten of northern Asian forests having luxuriant dark brown fur
details:
adjective
- of a dark somewhat brownish black
noun
- marten of northern Asian forests having luxuriant dark brown fur
- a scarf (or trimming) made of sable
- an artist's brush made of sable hairs
= synonyms: sable brush, sable's hair pencil
- a very dark black
= synonyms: ebony, coal black, jet-black, jet black, pitch black, soot black
- the expensive dark brown fur of the marten
